data.title: Master Of Science in Software Development
data.description: As a master student in Software Development, I did many projects throughout my academic years with new technologies, skills and programming languages as well as developed expertise in agile software development techniques.

data.title: Self-Study
data.description:
Finished the following courses from Coursera:
1. Introduction to Software Testing - University of Minnesota.
2. Programming Mobile Applications for Android Handheld Systems - Univeresity of Maryland.
3. Computing with Data Analysis - John Hopkins University
4. An Introduction to Interactive Programming in Python - Rice University

data.title: Technical Recruiter
data.description: Identified and filled job openings and keeped records of applications. Communicated with the candidates and helped them to fill in the job openings. Developed and implemented the add-on google scripts for the management.

data.title: Application Software Designer
data.description: Designed and developed automated tools for the design group and product verification team. Designed and developed test automation tool for the web-based administration system of a carrier grade IP telephony service. Developed test plans and procedures to WebAdmin with different web traffic to provide comparative platform performance, performance testing and product scalability characterization. Analyst the results from the tests and generate reports to the management.

data.title: Java Programmer(Contractor)
data.description: A project contracted with Environmental Canada. Recoded the application from ground-zero. Gathered, analyzed user requirements, added features and enhancements to apply user requirements. Deployed and installed the application in different platforms.

data.title:
Software Developer/Tester
(Contractor/Subcontractor)
data.description:
1. Collected rquirements from users, analyzed them and applied them to the applications. Analyzed testing requirements and organized them into the documents. Wrote and executed test cases. Imported data and completed the data conversion from one platform to another.
2. Converted the Inventory System to Year2000 compliance. Provided testing procedures and implemented the testing procedures for checking the convection.
3. Solved the Year 2000 problem for the system and solved the problem of porting data in different platforms.

data.title: Programmer/Programmer Analyst
data.description: Details is in my resume. Had worked in two banks in Hong Kong. Mainly designed , coded, specified, documented and supported the banking system.
